data.title: Parenting App for Child Custody
data.meta_description: The OurFamilyWizard website, iOS and Android mobile apps help parents to manage child custody schedules and co-parenting information from separate homes.
data.text:
Empowering amicable parenting

Co-parenting can be tough. You are navigating an unexpected new reality. OurFamilyWizard helps reduce conflict—so your kids have two healthy homes.

Powerful features custom fit to your family

New: Secure calling for co-parents

Stay connected to your child when you're apart. Use Calls for a midweek chat, virtual visitation, or to talk with your co-parent.

Consent is required for both parents—turn on consent when you're ready to receive video or audio calls.

Call activity is automatically documented, from who called to who turned off their mic.

Calls use an internet connection, not a cell network, so your phone number is never shared.

Shared co-parent calendar

Simplify your shared parenting schedule and request/accept time trades in one click—reducing tension from back-and-forth negotiation.

Stay organized with color-coded time slots and real-time updates

Simplify time trades with Yes/No responses

Solidify holiday schedules well into the future

Documented messaging

Instead of sending text messages and emails, communicate through one app. Ensure all communications with your co-parent remain on the record. Because messages are unalterable and securely stored in our servers, you will always have one court-admissible source of truth.

Timestamps record when a message was received and read, providing transparency and accountability

Login history gives a clear picture of everyone's in-app activity

Easy expense tracking

Tracking shared parenting expenses, attach receipt files, and keep an accurate payment history so you know who paid what and can settle reimbursements with less legwork.

Specify payment responsibility splits like 50/50, 80/20, etc.

Resolve unpaid expenses with in-app bank transfers via OFWpay™

Always know what you owe with real-time balance tracking

Important info, on-demand

The Info Bank securely stores medical histories, insurance information, emergency contacts, school schedules, photos, and more—so you're never scrambling for details when they matter most.

Access everything from medical records and insurance policies to school information

Upload and store documents and details

Reduce reliance on your co-parent for vital information

Tone-check your messages

ToneMeter helps keep communication respectful by identifying and flagging emotionally charged phrases while you write, empowering productive, low-conflict conversations.

Prevent conflict before it starts with ToneMeter flags

Like an emotional spell check, ToneMeter can improve communication patterns over time

Helping families living separately thrive since 2001

The app saved us

I can’t say enough good things about this app and website!! Me and the mother of my children have been separated since our sons were 1 yrs old and before getting this app we had a lot of challenges communicating on major topics. This app saved us and always made this clear and simplistic.

App Review

Conflicts have become far less frequent

OurFamilyWizard has been a H U G E blessing since being court ordered to use it. It has brought undeniable accountability to co-parenting my son, and the conflicts have become far less frequent. As a direct result, I have watched my son flourish and become confident and loving of both myself and his mother. No further need for counseling and a complete 180 with his academics.

App Review

Unburdens parents from stressful co-parenting

This app massively unburdens parents from stressful co-parenting situations. Everything is logged, clearly organized, viewable by a judge, a great way to distance yourself from a toxic co-parent and keep things simple and streamlined for the benefit of the child.

App Review

A great way to start co-parenting effectively

OurFamilyWizard is a great way to start co-parenting effectively especially if you are dealing with a combative parent. It helps monitor and store all the messages for future references. I have had great experiences with it thus far and more than likely will be continuing to use it for the long run!

App Review

Your next step is simple: Try us for 30 days.

The OurFamilyWizard app is risk-free with our money-back guarantee

As Seen In

Do you work with parents?

See why more legal professionals recommend OurFamilyWizard to their clients than any other co-parenting app.
